name: Array.Extra

values.name: apply
values.comment: Apply an array of functions to an array of values.
values.type: Array.Array (a -> b) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array b

values.name: filterMap
values.comment:
Apply a function that may succeed to all values in the array, but only keep the successes.

    String.toInt : String -> Maybe Int
    filterMap String.toInt (fromList ["3", "4.0", "5", "hats"]) == fromList [3,5]
values.type: (a -> Maybe.Maybe b) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array b

values.name: getUnsafe
values.comment: Unsafe version of get, don't use this unless you know what you're doing!
values.type: Int -> Array.Array a -> a

values.name: map2
values.comment:
Combine two arrays, combining them with the given function.
If one array is longer, the extra elements are dropped.

    map2 (+) [1,2,3] [1,2,3,4] == [2,4,6]
    map2 (,) [1,2,3] ['a','b'] == [ (1,'a'), (2,'b') ]
    pairs : Array a -> Array b -> Array (a,b)
    pairs lefts rights =
        map2 (,) lefts rights
values.type: (a -> b -> result) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array result

values.name: map3
values.type: (a -> b -> c -> result) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array c -> Array.Array result

values.name: map4
values.type: (a -> b -> c -> d -> result) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array c -> Array.Array d -> Array.Array result

values.name: map5
values.type: (a -> b -> c -> d -> e -> result) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array c -> Array.Array d -> Array.Array e -> Array.Array result

values.name: removeAt
values.comment: Remove the element at the given index
values.type: Int -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: resizelIndexed
values.comment: Resize an array from the left, padding the right-hand side with the given index function.
values.type: Int -> (Int -> a) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: resizelRepeat
values.comment: Resize an array from the left, padding the right-hand side with the given value.
values.type: Int -> a -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: resizerIndexed
values.comment: Resize an array from the right, padding the left-hand side with the given index function.
values.type: Int -> (Int -> a) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: resizerRepeat
values.comment: Resize an array from the right, padding the left-hand side with the given value.
values.type: Int -> a -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: sliceFrom
values.comment:
Drop *n* first elements from an array. In other words, slice an array from an index until the very end. Given negative argument, count the end of the slice from the end of the array.

    sliceFrom  5 (fromList [0..9]) == fromList [5,6,7,8,9]
    sliceFrom -3 (fromList [0..9]) == fromList [7,8,9]
values.type: Int -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: sliceUntil
values.comment:
Take *n* first elements from an array. In other words, slice an array from the very beginning until index not including. Given negative argument, count the beginning of the slice from the end of the array.

    sliceUntil  5 (fromList [0..9]) == fromList [0,1,2,3,4]
    sliceUntil -3 (fromList [0..9]) == fromList [0,1,2,3,4,5,6]
values.type: Int -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: splitAt
values.comment: Split an array into two arrays, the first ending at and the second starting at the given index
values.type: Int -> Array.Array a -> ( Array.Array a, Array.Array a )

values.name: update
values.comment:
Update the element at the index using a function. Returns the array unchanged if the index is out of bounds.

    update  1 ((+)10) (fromList [1,2,3]) == fromList [1,12,3]
    update  4 ((+)10) (fromList [1,2,3]) == fromList [1,2,3]
    update -1 ((+)10) (fromList [1,2,3]) == fromList [1,2,3]
values.type: Int -> (a -> a) -> Array.Array a -> Array.Array a

values.name: zip
values.type: Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array ( a, b )

values.name: zip3
values.type: Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array c -> Array.Array ( a, b, c )

values.name: zip4
values.type: Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array c -> Array.Array d -> Array.Array ( a, b, c, d )

values.name: zip5
values.type: Array.Array a -> Array.Array b -> Array.Array c -> Array.Array d -> Array.Array e -> Array.Array ( a, b, c, d, e )
